questions.uddipok:
Write a paragraph on "College Magazine" answering the following questions.

a) What is the main purpose of the college magazine?

b) What types of articles or features are typically included in it?

c) How does the magazine promote campus events and activities?

d) What themes or issues are often highlighted in the magazine?

e) How does a College Magazine help students to shape their future aspirations?

sub_questions.explanation:
College Magazine

A college magazine provides a valuable platform for students to share their creativity, achievements, and college news. The main purpose of a college magazine is to give students a place to share their creative work, news, and achievements. It highlights the talents of students and keeps everyone updated on college events. A college magazine typically includes articles, stories, poems, and essays. It also has fun sections like jokes, quizzes, and puzzles. Messages from the principal and reports on important college events are also included. By covering campus events and activities, the magazine promotes school spirit'and keeps students connected. Common themes in a college magazine include campus culture, social issues, science, and student achievements. These topics encourage, students to think about important matters and feel proud of their community. A college magazine also helps students develop skills for the future. By writing, editing, or managing parts of the magazine, students improve their writing and teamwork skills. They get a chance to explore future career paths in fields like writing, journalism, and editing. Overall, a college magazine allows students to express their ideas, learn new skills, and prepare for their aspirations.

questions.uddipok: Write a composition on " Duties of a Student".

sub_questions.explanation:
Duties of a Student Or, Student Life

Student life is the most useful and valuable period in a man's life. This is the time when the seeds of future life are sown. For this, it is called the sowing season in our life. During this period, a student has to do certain things to be successful and happy in his future life. The principal duty of a student is to study and acquire knowledge on various things. He must study according to a routine. He has to be attentive to his studies and teachers. He should also read newspapers, magazines, literature, history, etc.

A student should remember that character is the crown of a man: Therefore, he has to cultivate good manners and other noble virtues. All moral qualities like honesty, modesty, truthfuilness, discipline, perseverance, sincerity, punctuality must be acquired during this time.

He should also render some services to his society and country. He should make the illiterate literate. He can make the farmers aware of the modern methods of cultivation. In population control, he can play an important role.

A student must obey and honour his parents. When they are sick, helpless or old, he must serve them. He should-also be obedient to his teachers and other superiors.

A student must not waste his time and energy. So, he must possess a sound health by taking regular physical exercise, taking part in games and sports. Moreover, he must always avoid evil company.

Besides, a student may have the knowledge of politics but he must not take part in active politics. It is because many political parties and their unethical leaders use them only for their selfish interest.
